vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.15.21
§ Azaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a Levite musician in the reign of David who played the harp in the procession which brought the ark from Obed-edom to Jerusalem
2) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes
3) father of Hoshea, prince of the tribe of Ephraim when David took the census
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   levita; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   padre de Oseas, jefe, tribu de Efraín, en tiempos del rey David; (c)   levita; en tiempos del rey Ezequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞撒西雅 或 亞撒細雅 或 阿撒細亞 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華是大能的"
1) 利未人樂手 (代上 15:21)
2) 希西家時代管理十一奉獻的利未人 (代下 31:13)
3) 大衛時代管以法蓮支派的首長 (代上 27:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚撒西雅 或 亚撒细雅 或 阿撒细亚 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华是大能的"
1) 利未人乐手 (代上 15:21)
2) 希西家时代管理十一奉献的利未人 (代下 31:13)
3) 大卫时代管以法莲支派的首长 (代上 27:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.27.20;
father of: Hoshea (H1954H)
§ Azaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a Levite musician in the reign of David who played the harp in the procession which brought the ark from Obed-edom to Jerusalem
2) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes
3) father of Hoshea, prince of the tribe of Ephraim when David took the census

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.13
§ Azaziah = "Jehovah is mighty"
1) a Levite musician in the reign of David who played the harp in the procession which brought the ark from Obed-edom to Jerusalem
2) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes
3) father of Hoshea, prince of the tribe of Ephraim when David took the census
